ğŸ‘‹ **Welcome to Music Bot!**

I can play music in your group voice chats.

**Commands:**
/play - Play a song
/pause - Pause playback
/resume - Resume playback
/skip - Skip current song
/stop - Stop playback
/queue - Show queue
/language - Change language
